official_title: A PHASE 2A, MULTICENTER, RANDOMIZED, DOUBLE-BLIND, PLACEBO-CONTROLLED, 16-WEEK STUDY EVALUATING THE SAFETY AND EFFICACY OF PF-06650833, PF-06700841, AND PF-06826647 IN ADULTS WITH MODERATE TO SEVERE HIDRADENITIS SUPPURATIVA
inclusion_criteria:
* male or female participants, between 18-75, with a diagnosis of moderate to severe Hidradenitis Suppurativa
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 75 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* History of human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) or positive HIV serology at screening,
* Infected with hepatitis B or hepatitis C viruses.
* Have evidence of active or latent or inadequately treated infection with Mycobacterium tuberculosis (TB)
